thread.title: BRIEF-Rosehill Resources Q1 Loss Per Share $0.22

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Rosehill Resources Q1 Loss Per Share $0.22
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Rosehill Resources Inc:
* Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.22 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.08 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* QTRLY TOTAL REVENUES $55.8 MILLION VERSUS $17.5 MILLION * GREW AVERAGE NET Q1 PRODUCTION TO 12,256 BARRELS OF OIL EQUIVALENT PER DAY, AN INCREASE OF 67% COMPARED TO Q4 OF 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
